page.title: 05MOORGREEN SHOW
page.content: {Moorgreen Show}is an annual show dating back to 1849.It is held every{ {Bank Holiday Monday}in August at Front Park,Watnall,Notts.It is a one day show from 9a.m. to 6p.m. and there is a small admission charge.The show is mainly for{agricultural}and{ {horticutural}exhibitions with many local and national entries in the many categories.There are also dogs,bees, rabbits and caged birds shown.Other attractions include horse jumping,side stalls,parachuting,hot air ballooning, bands,a fair and visiting celebrities. The show is constantly changing and any profit is used to improve the show the following year.Facilities include good parking,toilets and information tents.The show is a good day's{ {entertainment}for all the family. .
